title: HYVE
author: HYVE
content: 🚨Upcoming token alert: From Friday, $PUNDIX & $FX will be integrated as payment options on the HYVE platform! 🤝PundiX is HYVE's earliest partner, with $HYVE due to become available on the XPOS system. 🚀Keep posted since PundiX will play a major role in our V2 platform launch!
